description.text: Thanks a lot... I was on a trip with my family, until we came across this... wolf. But it didn't act like one. If anything it behaved more like... a man. It ran to us as soon as it laid eyes on us, and.. well, I'm the only one who made it out alive. That was 2 years ago, but I still remember the place where it happened. Please, exterminate this creature. Avenge my family.
